thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.co.nz
thread.title: Tania

author: Tania
title: Tania
text: Brilliant sample pack received (on my desk less than 24 hours after initial enquiry) making it really easy to choose what we wanted. Also gave us some ideas for future orders. Loved the mock up product emailed through to us as well. Totally hassle-free process from initial order to delivery of final product. Lisa was responsive, answered all my questions clearly and made the whole order and payment process simple. Fantastic turnaround time - final product was on my desk 5 working days from payment - exactly as advertised!
